00040 void RequestHandlerUpdateSchema::run() {
00041   ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, m_event_ptr);
00042   TableIdentifier table;
00043   const uint8_t *decode_ptr = m_event_ptr->payload;
00044   size_t decode_remain = m_event_ptr->payload_len;
00045 
00046   try {
00047     table.decode(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00048     const char *schema_str = decode_vstr(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00049 
00050     m_range_server->update_schema(&cb, &table, schema_str);
00051   }
00052   catch (Exception &e) {
00053     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00054     cb.error(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, "Error handling Update Schema message");
00055   }
00056 }
